string-array.name: titles
string-array.item: Will help properly distribute the cargo in the container, the truck, on the pallet in 3D
Modelling the client\'s order in the program on transport with preset sizes or manually set
Increase the efficiency of transshipment operations using 3D models to clearly display the location of the cargo; form a step-by- step scheme of cargo loading

resources.string: The system is clever planning of cargo space:
Will help properly distribute the cargo in the container, the truck, on the pallet in 3D
Modelling the client\'s order in the program on transport with preset sizes or manually set.
Increase the efficiency of transshipment operations using 3D models to clearly display the location of the cargo; form a step-by- step scheme of cargo loading.
